page.title: 05Community Life
page.content: The local School has closed and the nearest schools are at Kineton.The Church at Chadshunt is C of E but has only a small congregation and shares its Vicar with the church at Kineton. The nearest Doctor and Dentist are at Kineton also and the nearest Hospitals at Warwick and Leamington. Even the nearest shop to the area is a small village store at Gaydon where the only policeman lives. There are few community activities, therefore, though harvest festival and Christmas festivities still survive. Some old people in the area are catered for by Meals on Wheels.
